mbean.name: SbbMonitor
mbean.description: Monitoring MBean for an SBB library instance

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: The lifecycle state the SBB library instance is in

attribute.name: NumParticipants
attribute.description: Number of participants registered with this SBB library instance

attribute.name: ReqRate1
attribute.description: average number of requests per minute

attribute.name: ReqRate1Period
attribute.description: number of minutes to aggregate data for ReqRate1

attribute.name: ReqRate2
attribute.description: average number of requests per minute

attribute.name: ReqRate2Period
attribute.description: number of minutes to aggregate data for ReqRate2

attribute.name: ReqRate3
attribute.description: average number of requests per minute

attribute.name: ReqRate3Period
attribute.description: number of minutes to aggregate data for ReqRate3

attribute.name: TotalRequests
attribute.description: total number of requests in the period

attribute.name: TotalRequestsPeriod
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for total requests

attribute.name: PctAppFail1
attribute.description: percentage of requests that failed due to application errors during the selected period

attribute.name: PctAppFail1Period
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for PctAppFail1

attribute.name: PctAppFail2
attribute.description: percentage of requests that failed due to application errors during the selected period

attribute.name: PctAppFail2Period
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for PctAppFail2

attribute.name: PctAppFail3
attribute.description: percentage of requests that failed due to application errors during the selected period

attribute.name: PctAppFail3Period
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for PctAppFail3

attribute.name: PctNetFail
attribute.description: percentage of failures due to network problems during selected period

attribute.name: PctNetFailPeriod
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for PctNetFail

attribute.name: AvgResponseTime
attribute.description: average response time in milliseconds for request/response style service operations

attribute.name: AvgResponseTimePeriod
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for AvgResponseTime

attribute.name: MaxResponseTime
attribute.description: maximum response time in milliseconds for request/response style service operations

attribute.name: MaxResponseTimePeriod
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for MaxResponseTime

attribute.name: MinResponseTime
attribute.description: minimum response time in milliseconds for request/response style service operations

attribute.name: MinResponseTimePeriod
attribute.description: sample period in minutes for MinResponseTime

attribute.name: JVMTotalMemory
attribute.description: total memory currently available to JVM in bytes

attribute.name: JVMMaxMemory
attribute.description: maximum memory available to JVM in bytes

attribute.name: JVMUtilPct
attribute.description: percentage of heap space used in JVM

attribute.name: JVMCpus
attribute.description: number of CPUs available to the JVM
